popular/video-22/questions.json: Vaccinations are incredibly important for fighting disease. But an increasingly large group of people seem to believe that vaccinations put our health at risk. There are many reports on the internet of negative vaccination effects such as allergies, disabilities and even deaths. And it's true, vaccination can have side effects. How do vaccinations work and how dangerous are they really?

Vaccinations work by introducing a small, harmless piece of a pathogen (such as a virus or bacteria) to the body, which triggers the production of antibodies and activates the immune system to fight off the infection.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

ukrbiology/book01/topic03-Поведінка твар: Why do animals exhibit unique and often inexplicable behavior?
The biological meaning of this or that behavior refers to the scientific study of animal behavior, which is known as ethology.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>
What are some examples of unique and often inexplicable animal behavior?
Hares, foxes, wolves, herons, flies, beetles, and crayfish are all examples of animals that exhibit unique and often inexplicable behavior.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>
What are some characteristic features of animals?
The characteristic features of animals include their behavior.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>
What are some methods of studying animal behavior?
